text: Dysgonomonas hofstadii is a Gram-negative and facultatively anaerobic bacterium from the genus of Dysgonomonas, which has been isolated from a post- operative abdominal wound. == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Dysgonomonas hofstadii at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase == Further reading == * Category:Bacteroidetes Category:Bacteria described in 2010
title: Dysgonomonas hofstadii
